Body:
data = np.array([[-1, 0, 1], [1, 0, -1], [0, 0, 0]])
x, y, z = calculate_persist_data(data, bins=(3, 3), range=((-0.5, 2.5), (-
    1.5, 1.5)))
np.testing.assert_array_equal(x, np.array([0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 
    2.0, 2.0, 2.0]))
np.testing.assert_array_equal(y, np.array([-1.0, 0.0, 1.0, -1.0, 0.0, 1.0, 
    -1.0, 0.0, 1.0]))
np.testing.assert_array_equal(z, np.array([1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0, 3.0, 0.0, 
    1.0, 1.0, 1.0]))
